title: The Worst Kind Of PTSD! | Unapologetic Episode 47

description: Abuse is a serious topic and often causes PTSD. Bobby shares some of his story of being abused by the church and why it is so severe. Take the OMA Mental Health Crash Course https://oneminuteapologist.com/mhcc
